name: SnowReportforPowderRidgePark(CT)
0:
”Alexa, open Powder Ridge Park”
”Alexa, ask Powder Ridge Park for the snow report”
”Alexa, ask Powder Ridge Park for latest conditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: powder ridge park
des: The Powder Ridge Park Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
